text.en: If A's income is 40% of B's income and B's income is 24% more than C's income, then by what percentage C's income is more than A?

trick_application: B's income is 24% more than C's income.
Percentage by which C's income is more than A's income = ((80.645 - 40) / 40) * 100 = 102% (approx).
